proj.zoie.api.indexing
接口 ZoieIndexable

所有已知实现类：
AbstractZoieIndexable, BatchedIndexDataLoader.ZoieIndexableDecorator, FileIndexableInterpreter.FileIndexable, HourglassIndexable
public interface ZoieIndexable

Builder object to produce indexing requests.

嵌套类摘要
static class ZoieIndexable.IndexingReq
          Wrapper object for a Lucene Document and an Analyzer
 
字段摘要
static String DOCUMENT_ID_FIELD
          已过时。 this field should no longer be used
 
方法摘要

          Builder method.
 long getUID()
          Gets the UID.

          Whether this is indexable is delete only.
 boolean isSkip()
          Whether or not to skip this request.
 

字段详细信息

DOCUMENT_ID_FIELD

static final String DOCUMENT_ID_FIELD
已过时。 this field should no longer be used
document ID field name

另请参见：
常量字段值
方法详细信息

getUID

long getUID()
Gets the UID.

返回：
UID

isDeleted

boolean isDeleted()
Whether this is indexable is delete only. If so, requests returned from buildIndexingReqs() will be ignored.

返回：
true if this is indexable is delete-only.

isSkip

boolean isSkip()
Whether or not to skip this request. This is useful whether information to decide whether to skip this request is not known until runtime.

返回：
true if this is indexable is to be skipped.

buildIndexingReqs

ZoieIndexable.IndexingReq[] buildIndexingReqs()
Builder method.

返回：
An array of indexing requests
